// Code generated by Arduino IoT Cloud, DO NOT EDIT.

#include <ArduinoIoTCloud.h>
#include <Arduino_ConnectionHandler.h>

const char DEVICE_LOGIN_NAME[]  = "30967353-420e-46bf-8604-4f3113535733";

const char SSID[]               = SECRET_SSID;    // Network SSID (name)
const char PASS[]               = SECRET_OPTIONAL_PASS;    // Network password (use for WPA, or use as key for WEP)
const char DEVICE_KEY[]  = SECRET_DEVICE_KEY;    // Secret device password

void onLightLevelChange();
void onMotionDetected1Change();
void onMotionDetected2Change();
void onMotionDetected3Change();

int lightLevel,LightLevel;
bool motionDetected1;
bool motionDetected2;
bool motionDetected3;

void initProperties(){

  ArduinoCloud.setBoardId(DEVICE_LOGIN_NAME);
  ArduinoCloud.setSecretDeviceKey(DEVICE_KEY);
  ArduinoCloud.addProperty(lightLevel, READWRITE, ON_CHANGE, onLightLevelChange);
  ArduinoCloud.addProperty(motionDetected1, READWRITE, ON_CHANGE, onMotionDetected1Change);
  ArduinoCloud.addProperty(motionDetected2, READWRITE, ON_CHANGE, onMotionDetected2Change);
  ArduinoCloud.addProperty(motionDetected3, READWRITE, ON_CHANGE, onMotionDetected3Change);

}

WiFiConnectionHandler ArduinoIoTPreferredConnection(SSID, PASS);
